title: chidambaram ena ninaivaay
sahitya:
cidambaram ena ninaivAi manamE cidambaramena ninaivAi 



anupallavi



matam kondaliyum manadum teLiyum idaya malaril amudam pozhiyum



caraNam



bhava kAma nAshan shivakAmi nEshan parishuddha bhaktar darishikkum Ishan

tavam Ongum tillaik-kanaka sabeshan navarasa kalA naTarAjan vAzhum
